missing_skills: Cloud Platform Experience (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)
resume_optimization_recommendations: Explicitly mention 'Big Data' in the skills or summary section to align with the job title.
Quantify achievements in projects and work experience to demonstrate impact (e.g., 'Improved model accuracy by X%').
Add specific cloud platform experience (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud) to the skills section and elaborate in project descriptions.
Include projects that involve processing large datasets using technologies like Hadoop, Spark, or Kafka.
Highlight experience with NoSQL databases like MongoDB or Cassandra.
Incorporate keywords like 'Data Pipelines' and 'Predictive Models' in the project descriptions to match job requirements.
Add a section detailing familiarity with MLOps practices and model monitoring techniques.
Expand on experience with data cleaning and preprocessing, emphasizing handling large volumes of data.
Refine project descriptions to showcase strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Tailor the resume to emphasize experience with the specific tools and technologies mentioned in the job description, such as NLP or time series forecasting if applicable.

Big Data Technologies.description: Learn to analyze, process, and manage large datasets using big data technologies.
Master the fundamentals of Apache Hadoop for data processing and analysis.

Big Data Technologies.course_name: Big Data Analytics with Apache Spark
Big Data Technologies.description: Explore big data analytics using Apache Spark for large-scale data processing.

Cloud Platform Experience (AWS, Azure, G.description: Learn the fundamentals of AWS cloud services and architecture.
Understand the basics of Azure cloud services and solutions.
Explore the core concepts of Google Cloud Platform for cloud computing.

MLOps.description: Learn how to implement, deploy, and manage machine learning models in production.
Deploy and manage machine learning models using AWS MLOps services.
Get started with MLOps and learn how to streamline the machine learning lifecycle.

Natural Language Processing (NLP).description: Master NLP techniques for text analysis, sentiment analysis, and language modeling.

Natural Language Processing (NLP).course_name: NLP - Natural Language Processing with Python
Natural Language Processing (NLP).description: Learn NLP using Python and NLTK library.
Using TensorFlow Hub to build and train NLP Models

Time Series Forecasting.description: Learn time series analysis and forecasting techniques using Python.

Time Series Forecasting.course_name: Time Series Analysis, Forecasting and Machine Learning
Time Series Forecasting.description: Learn data analysis, forecasting, and machine learning techniques for time series data.
Build and evaluate time series models for forecasting and prediction.
